explanation: The original code used p.index(x) which returns a 0-based index, but the problem expects a 1-based position. I fixed the print line to add 1 to the index so the output is 1-based. This is analogous to fixes that adjust off-by-one errors (e.g., adding or taking max/min in the retrieved diffs).
fixed_code:
n, x = map(int, input().split())
p = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(p.index(x) + 1)
